input.sentences: i visited my brother in his new city .
there was a parade he wanted me to go to .
i saw people that looked like giant bats .
i statue of the city 's founder faces north .
the capitol building looked very cool as i left in the night .
output.sentences: I was visiting my brother in a foreign city.
He brought me to an annual festival.
There were extravagant costumes and performances.
Surrounding the cities were heirlooms of its ancient past.
